unnormalised: EV Charging Gets a Desi Boost, Just in Time for Diwali!
normalised: E V Charging Gets a Desi Boost, Just in Time for Diwali!

unnormalised: Bangalore is buzzing! Forget queuing for that Diwali mithai, the new EV chargers are popping up faster than you can say 'Gulab Jamun'!
normalised: Bangalore is buzzing! Forget queuing for that Diwali mithai, the new E V chargers are popping up faster than you can say 'Gulab Jamun'!

unnormalised: IIT Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast-charging tech. They're claiming we could see full charges in like, half the time! Imagine getting from Chennai to Trichy without range anxiety.
normalised: I I T Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast-charging tech. They're claiming we could see full charges in like, half the time! Imagine getting from Chennai to Trichy without range anxiety.

unnormalised: Rumor has it, Ather is also planning a massive expansion of its charging grid across Kerala, just in time for Onam next year. Think of it: cruising down to Kochi, stuffed with delicious Onam sadhya, knowing your scooter's got your back.
normalised: Rumor has it, Ather is also planning a massive expansion of its charging grid across Kerala, just in time for Onam next year. Think of it: cruising down to Kochi, stuffed with delicious Onam sadhya, knowing your scooter's got your back.

unnormalised: Tata Power is also joining the race, pledging to install thousands of chargers across national highways in the next year.
normalised: Tata Power is also joining the race, pledging to install thousands of chargers across national highways in the next year.

unnormalised: The cost? Early estimations point to around Rs. 10 per unit. Not bad, considering petrol prices these days.
normalised: The cost? Early estimations point to around rupee ten per unit. Not bad, considering petrol prices these days.

unnormalised: Charging stations are becoming the new chai stalls, a place to refresh, relax, and maybe even grab a quick biryani while your ride juices up.
normalised: Charging stations are becoming the new chai stalls, a place to refresh, relax, and maybe even grab a quick biryani while your ride juices up.

unnormalised: With all these developments, the future of EVs in India is looking brighter than a Diwali diya!
normalised: With all these developments, the future of E V S in India is looking brighter than a Diwali diya!
